title: Inspiration-sharing app with posts, discovery, messaging, and 1:1 calling (voice/video)

requirements.text: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and a basic user profile model (display name, avatar, bio) that is persisted in the Motoko canister and shown in the UI.

quotes: Create an app for getting inspirations like pinterest but you can post,call people and even video chat and message

acceptanceCriteria: Users can sign in/out using Internet Identity.
On first sign-in, a user profile is created with editable fields (at least display name + bio).
Profile data persists across reloads and is tied to the authenticated principal.
A profile page/screen displays the user’s profile and their posted content.

requirements.text: Add core content features for a Pinterest-like inspiration feed: create posts with an image and caption, browse a home feed, view a post detail page, and list a user’s posts on their profile.

quotes: Create an app for getting inspirations like pinterest but you can post...

acceptanceCriteria: Signed-in users can create a post with: image + caption (minimum); optional tags.
Users can browse a home feed of posts.
Clicking a post opens a detail view with full image and metadata (author, caption, created time).
Users can view a profile page that lists that user’s posts.
Posts persist across reloads and are retrievable from the canister.

requirements.text: Add lightweight discovery tools: search posts by caption/tags and allow browsing by tag.

quotes: Create an app for getting inspirations like pinterest...

acceptanceCriteria: A search UI allows entering text and shows matching posts.
Selecting a tag filters/browses posts for that tag.
Search and tag browsing query the backend (not only client-side filtering).

requirements.text: Implement 1:1 in-app messaging between users with conversation list, message history, and sending new messages; use a polling-based refresh strategy (no WebSockets).
acceptanceCriteria: Users can start or open a direct conversation with another user (by selecting from a user list or from a post author).
Users can send text messages and see them appear in the conversation history.
A conversation list shows recent conversations and latest message preview.
Messages persist in the backend and load correctly after refresh/relogin.
The UI periodically refreshes message history via polling (no WebSockets).

requirements.text: Provide 1:1 calling flows for voice and video chat using browser-based peer-to-peer media (WebRTC) with canister-mediated signaling suitable for a non-WebSocket environment (e.g., polling). Include an incoming call prompt, in-call controls, and call termination.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can initiate a voice call or video call to another user from a profile, chat, or post-author context.
The receiving user sees an incoming call prompt and can accept/decline.
When accepted, both users see an in-call UI with at least: mute/unmute, camera on/off (for video), and hang up.
If a call is declined, missed, or ended, both sides return to a stable UI state and can attempt again.
Signaling data required to establish calls is exchanged via the canister using non-WebSocket requests (e.g., polling).

requirements.text: Create a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the app (colors, typography, layout, and component styling) and apply it consistently across feed, post creation, post detail, profile, messaging, and calling screens (avoid blue/purple as primary colors unless required).

quotes: Create an app for getting inspirations like pinterest...

acceptanceCriteria: The UI has a consistent theme (color palette, type scale, spacing, component styling) across all screens.
Primary colors are not blue/purple by default.
Key flows (browse, create post, view post, message, call) are visually cohesive and usable on mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets (logo/app mark and a small set of empty-state illustrations) and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve generated images through the backend).

quotes: Create an app for getting inspirations like pinterest...

acceptanceCriteria: The generated logo is used in the app header/login area.
Empty-state illustrations appear for at least: empty feed, empty messages.
All generated images are loaded as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all core logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not introduce external databases or cloud services; persist data in-canister.
Frontend must use React + TypeScript with Tailwind/Shadcn and React Query for data fetching/caching.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutablePaths; compose them instead.
Do not use WebSockets/Socket.io for messaging or call signaling; use non-WebSocket patterns such as polling.
nonGoals: Group chats or community chat rooms.
Public social media integrations or third-party auth providers (other than Internet Identity).
Push notifications, SMS, or email notifications.
Advanced recommendation algorithms (e.g., ML-based ranking) beyond basic feed ordering/search.

required: Minimal modern logo mark: abstract pin + spark motif, flat vector style (logo-mark.dim_512x512.png)
Empty state illustration: cozy desk with moodboard/collage elements, warm palette, flat vector style (empty-feed.dim_1200x800.png)
Empty state illustration: two chat bubbles with small collage scraps, warm palette, flat vector style (empty-messages.dim_1200x800.png)
